wip.description: Coming soon... a web app for cyclists and runners to discover nearby Strava segments, assess their difficulty, and plan optimal attempts based on wind and ranking potential.

about.title: About
about.description11: The komquest project was born from a passion for cycling and running combined with a desire to create a useful tool. It's a web application that allows athletes to discover nearby Strava segments by evaluating their difficulty to aim for a KOM/QOM, top 10, or Local Legend status.
about.description12: The goal is to make segment exploration strategic and motivating for true KOM hunters. Thus, the features currently under development are:

features.feature2: Leaderboard analysis to assess segment difficulty and accessibility
features.feature3: Weather conditions integration to optimize attempts
features.feature5: Interactive map to visualize segments and conditions

about.description2: My name is Balthazar, a computer engineering student. I've often looked for a personal project idea to develop but always lacked the desire and motivation to get started. Being passionate about running and cycling for several years and also a Strava user, I decided to combine these interests to develop komquest.
